trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods for locating .NET Framework and .NET Framework SDK files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 提供一些实用工具方法，用于查找 .NET Framework 和 .NET Framework SDK 文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>运行[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>使用类来生成所需运行任务的信息。

trans-unit.source: Clears the appDomain wide cache of platform and extension SDKs.
trans-unit.target: 清除平台和扩展 SDKs 的 appDomain 宽缓存。

trans-unit.source: The root registry location for the targeted framework.
trans-unit.target: 目标框架的根注册表位置。

trans-unit.source: For .NET this is SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\\.NETFramework.
trans-unit.target: 对于 .NET，为 SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\\.NETFramework。

trans-unit.source: The targeted framework version (2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, ….).
The name of the folder, (AssemblyFoldersEx) could also be PocketPC\AssemblyFoldersEx, or others.
trans-unit.target: 该文件夹的名称，(AssemblyFoldersEx) 也可能是 PocketPC 或 AssemblyFoldersEx 或其他。

trans-unit.source: The targeted minimum and maximum OS versions in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表的目标最小和最大操作系统版本。

trans-unit.source: These values are used to return only directories for OS versions between the declared minimum and maximum.
trans-unit.target: 这些值仅用于返回声明的最小值和最大值之间的操作系统版本目录。

trans-unit.source: If this value is blank or null, no filtering is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为空或为 NULL，则不进行筛选。

trans-unit.source: The targeted platform GUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 目标的平台 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Used to return only directories which have a matching platform GUID.
trans-unit.target: 用于返回具有匹配的平台 GUID 仅的内容。

trans-unit.source: If this value is blank or null no filtering is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为空或为 NULL，则不进行筛选。

trans-unit.source: The targeted processor architecture.
trans-unit.target: 目标处理器层次结构。

trans-unit.source: This determines which registry hives are searched and in which order.
trans-unit.target: 这将确定注册表单元搜索和以何种顺序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a sorted list of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.AssemblyFoldersExInfo" /> objects which contain information about the directories in which the third party assemblies are registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.AssemblyFoldersExInfo" /> 对象的已排序列表，这些对象包含第三方程序集注册所在目录的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This information is used at build and design time.
trans-unit.target: 此信息在生成中使用和设计时使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns list of <see langword="AssemblyFoldersExInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see langword="AssemblyFoldersExInfo" /> 的列表。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the `AssemblyFoldersEx` registry location and returns the list of `AssemblyFoldersExInfo` in the same order that they are searched for reference assemblies at design and build time.
trans-unit.target: 此方法枚举`AssemblyFoldersEx`注册表位置，并返回的列表`AssemblyFoldersExInfo`顺序它们在设计的引用程序集来搜索和生成时间。

trans-unit.source: On a 64-bit operating system, if targeting 64-bit, add in the 64-bit hive then the 32-bit hive; if targeting 32-bit, add in the 32-bit hive then the 64-bit hive.
trans-unit.target: 64 位操作系统上，如果面向 64 位，添加在 64 位 hive 然后 32 位 hive 中;如果目标 32 位，，添加在 32 位 hive 然后的 64 位配置单元。

trans-unit.source: On 32-bit machine only add in the 32-bit hive.
trans-unit.target: 在仅 32 位计算机上的 32 位配置单元中添加。

trans-unit.source: The target framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 目标框架目录。

trans-unit.source: The framework name.
trans-unit.target: 框架名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a display name given the target framework details.
trans-unit.target: 在给定目标框架详细信息的情况下创建显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a display name given the target framework details.
trans-unit.target: 在给定目标框架详细信息的情况下返回显示名称。

trans-unit.source: This is the equivalent of the target framework moniker, but for display.
trans-unit.target: 此命令等效的目标框架名字对象，而是用于显示。

trans-unit.source: If one cannot be found from the redist list file, a synthesized one is returned, so there is always a display name.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个无法找到从 redist 列表文件，合成类型的值，则返回其中一个，因此没有始终显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full name of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root registry key.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 根注册表项的全名。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the full name of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root registry key.
trans-unit.target: 包含 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 根注册表项的全名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the value under the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion)" /> that contains the .NET Framework SDK installation path.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 .NET Framework SDK 安装路径的 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion)" /> 下的值的名称。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the value under the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion)" /> that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK installation path.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 安装路径的 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion)" /> 下的值的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the name of the registry key value under the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion)" /> that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK installation path.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含注册表项值的名称的字符串，该值位于包含 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 安装路径的 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion)" /> 下。

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Version of Visual Studio the requested SDK is associated with
trans-unit.target: 所需 SDK 的 Visual Studio 版本相关于

trans-unit.source: Name of the value of GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey that contains the SDK install root path
trans-unit.target: 包含 SDK 安装根路径的 GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey 值名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of the .NET Framework SDK root registry key.
trans-unit.target: 返回 .NET Framework SDK 根注册表项的全名。

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of the .NET Framework SDK root registry key.
trans-unit.target: 返回 .NET Framework SDK 根注册表项的全名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the registry key root which indicates where to find the .NETFramework sdk.
trans-unit.target: 返回注册表项根的字符串表示形式，用于指示 .NET Framework SDK 的查找位置。

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Version of Visual Studio the requested SDK is associated with
trans-unit.target: 所需 SDK 的 Visual Studio 版本相关于

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of the .NET Framework SDK root registry key
trans-unit.target: 返回 .NET Framework SDK 根注册表项的全名

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] folder.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 文件夹的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prefix of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] folder.
trans-unit.target: 返回 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 文件夹的前缀。

trans-unit.source: An example of the value returned is the string "v2.0".
trans-unit.target: 返回的一个示例是值的字符串"v2.0"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to the .NET Framework root directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取 NET Framework 根目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 根目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified path to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root directory, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 根目录的完全限定路径；如果未安装 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的目标版本，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Desired architecture, or DotNetFrameworkArchitecture.Current for the architecture this process is currently running under.
trans-unit.target: 所需的体系结构或当前运行此进程的体系结构的 DotNetFrameworkArchitecture.Current。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to the framework's root directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取框架根目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns a fully qualified path to the framework's root directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回框架根目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取 .NET Framework SDK 目录中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The file to locate in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] directory.
trans-unit.target: 要在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 目录中查找的文件。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 目录中的文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified path to the specified file, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含指定文件的完全限定路径；如果未安装 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的目标版本，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>运行[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>使用类来生成所需运行任务的信息。

trans-unit.source: File name to locate in the .NET Framework directory
trans-unit.target: 要在 .NET Framework 目录中查找的文件名

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Desired architecture, or DotNetFrameworkArchitecture.Current for the architecture this process is currently running under.
trans-unit.target: 所需的体系结构或当前运行此进程的体系结构的 DotNetFrameworkArchitecture.Current。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the frameworks root directory for the specified architecture.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定体系结构的框架根目录中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns a fully qualified path to a file in the frameworks root directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回框架根目录中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to the reference assemblies location for the given framework version.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的 framework 版本的引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the fully qualified path to the Reference Assemblies folder, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the targeted version of the .NET Framework is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 Reference Assemblies 文件夹的完全限定路径的字符串；如果未安装目标版本的 .NET Framework，则为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 .NET Framework SDK 的 /bin 目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 的 \bin 目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 的 \bin 目录的完全限定路径；如果未安装 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] SDK 的目标版本，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Version of Visual Studio the requested SDK is associated with
trans-unit.target: 所需 SDK 的 Visual Studio 版本相关于

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to the "bin" directory of the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 返回路径到 .NET Framework SDK的“bin”目录。

trans-unit.source: Path string.
trans-unit.target: 路径字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 .NET Framework SDK 中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The file to locate in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
trans-unit.target: 要在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 中查找的文件。

trans-unit.source: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
trans-unit.target: 要针对的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path to a file in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 中的文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK 的 \bin 目录的完全限定路径；如果未安装 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] SDK 的目标版本，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The path for the SDK takes in consideration the processor architecture environment information for the calling process, so it might end up being ".../bin/i64", for example.
trans-unit.target: Sdk 的路径需要考虑的处理器体系结构环境信息调用进程，因此它可能最终将".../bin/i64"，例如。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToDotNetFrameworkFile%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToSystemFile%2A> this method checks for the existence of the file, so that an invalid `fileName` returns null.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToDotNetFrameworkFile%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToSystemFile%2A>此方法检查是否存在该文件，以便无效`fileName`，则返回 null。

trans-unit.source: File name to locate in the .NET Framework SDK directory
trans-unit.target: 要在 .NET Framework SDK 目录中查找的文件名

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: The required architecture of the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 所请求文件的所需体系结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 .NET Framework SDK 中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 返回 .NET Framework SDK 中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Throws an error if the .NET Framework SDK can't be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 .NET Framework SDK，则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: File name to locate in the .NET Framework SDK directory
trans-unit.target: 要在 .NET Framework SDK 目录中查找的文件名

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Version of Visual Studio associated with the requested SDK.
trans-unit.target: 与请求 SDK 关联的 Visual Studio 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Get a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 .NET Framework SDK 中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Error if the .NET Framework SDK can't be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 .NET Framework SDK，则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Path string.
trans-unit.target: 路径字符串。

trans-unit.source: File name to locate in the .NET Framework SDK directory
trans-unit.target: 要在 .NET Framework SDK 目录中查找的文件名

trans-unit.source: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 目标 .NET Framework 的版本

trans-unit.source: Version of Visual Studio associated with the requested SDK.
trans-unit.target: 与请求 SDK 关联的 Visual Studio 的版本。

trans-unit.source: The required architecture of the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 所请求文件的所需体系结构。

trans-unit.source: Get a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK.
trans-unit.target: 获取 .NET Framework SDK 中文件的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Error if the .NET Framework SDK can't be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 .NET Framework SDK，则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Path string.
trans-unit.target: 路径字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定目标框架的引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: The framework name.
trans-unit.target: 框架名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定目标框架的引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the paths to the reference assemblies location.
trans-unit.target: 返回引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory that is specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles.
trans-unit.target: 此方法假定所请求的 ReferenceAssemblyRoot 路径将 Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles 由指定的程序文件目录。

trans-unit.source: In addition, when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, or 4, the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当。TargetFrameworkVersion 为 2.0、 3.0、 3.5 或 4 NETFramework 或.NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers 会看到，将返回适用于旧的.NET framework 的正确链接的引用程序集路径。

trans-unit.source: This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.
trans-unit.target: 此链接将使用现有的 GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies 来生成引用程序集路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: When the frameworkName is null
trans-unit.target: 在 frameworkName 为 null 时。

trans-unit.source: Root directory which will be used to calculate the reference assembly path.
trans-unit.target: 将用于计算引用程序集路径的根目录。

trans-unit.source: The references assembies will be generated in the following way TargetFrameworkRootPath\TargetFrameworkIdentifier\TargetFrameworkVersion\SubType\TargetFrameworkSubType.
trans-unit.target: 将按照 TargetFrameworkRootPath\TargetFrameworkIdentifier\TargetFrameworkVersion\SubType\TargetFrameworkSubType 的方式生成引用程序集。

trans-unit.source: A frameworkName class which represents a TargetFrameworkMoniker.
trans-unit.target: 表示 TargetFrameworkMoniker 的 frameworkName 类。

trans-unit.source: This cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given framework version relative to a given targetFrameworkRoot.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定的框架版本的引用程序集位置相对于给定的 targetFrameworkRoot 的路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the paths to the reference assemblies location.
trans-unit.target: 返回引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: This method does not check to see if the path exists or not.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会检查以确定路径是否存在与否。

trans-unit.source: Identifier being targeted
trans-unit.target: 目标标识符

trans-unit.source: Version being targeted
trans-unit.target: 目标版本

trans-unit.source: Profile being targeted
trans-unit.target: 目标配置文件

trans-unit.source: Returns the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定目标框架的引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: This method will assume the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles In additon when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5 or 4.0 we will return the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将假设请求的 ReferenceAssemblyRoot 路径为 Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles 指定的 ProgramFiles 目录。另外，如果找到 .NET Framework 或 .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers 并且 targetFrameworkVersion 为 2.0、3.0、3.5 或 4.0，则返回早期 .NET Framework 版本的正确链接的引用程序集路径。

trans-unit.source: This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.
trans-unit.target: 此链接将使用现有的 GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies 来生成引用程序集路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: Collection of reference assembly locations.
trans-unit.target: 引用程序集位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the frameworkName is null
trans-unit.target: 在 frameworkName 为 null 时。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework's standard libraries (i.e. mscorlib).
trans-unit.target: 返回给定目标框架的标准库（即 mscorlib）的引用程序集位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: This method will assume the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles In addition when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5 or 4.0 we will return the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将假设请求的 ReferenceAssemblyRoot 路径为 Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles 指定的 ProgramFiles 目录。另外，如果找到 .NET Framework 或 .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers 并且 targetFrameworkVersion 为 2.0、3.0、3.5 或 4.0，则返回早期 .NET Framework 版本的正确链接的引用程序集路径。

trans-unit.source: Get a list of target platform SDKs on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 获取机器上目标平台 SDK 列表。

trans-unit.source: Get a list of target platform SDKs on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 获取机器上目标平台 SDK 列表。

trans-unit.source: List of Target Platform SDKs, Item1: TargetPlatformName Item2: Version of SDK Item3: Path to sdk root
trans-unit.target: 目标平台 SDKs 列表， Item1: TargetPlatformName Item2: SDK 版本 Item3: sdk 根路径。

trans-unit.target: 要查找平台 SDK 的注册表根位置

trans-unit.source: Get a list of target platform SDKs on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 获取机器上目标平台 SDK 列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of target platform SDKs.
trans-unit.target: 返回目标平台 SDK 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Target framework root directory.
trans-unit.target: 目标框架根目录。

trans-unit.source: Framework identifier.
trans-unit.target: 框架标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the highest version of a target framework moniker based on the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于标识符的目标框架名字对象的最高版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the highest version of a target framework moniker based on the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回基于标识符的目标框架名字对象的最高版本。

trans-unit.source: This method will only find full frameworks; no profiles will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将仅查找完全框架；不返回任何配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path of the system directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取系统目录的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a directory path to the system directory.
trans-unit.target: 包含指向系统目录的目录路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An example of the value returned is the string "C:\WinNT\System32".
trans-unit.target: 返回的一个示例是值的"C:\WinNT\System32"的字符串。
